title: How to Transfer Contacts when Switching Between Nokia Phones

steps.title: Go to tools on your Nokia mobile phone (preferably the more recent model of the two) by selecting the menu.
steps.content: Go to tools on your Nokia mobile phone (preferably the more recent model of the two) by selecting the menu.

steps.title: Select settings (This may be available under "Tools" or directly under "Menu").
steps.content: Select settings (This may be available under "Tools" or directly under "Menu").

steps.title: In settings, select sync and backup settings which leads you to a sub menu.
steps.content: In settings, select sync and backup settings which leads you to a sub menu.

steps.title: In the sub menu select "phone switch".
steps.content: In the sub menu select "phone switch".

steps.title: Follow the instructions given.
steps.content: Follow the instructions given. This will let you sync both phones via bluetooth and let you transfer the required data such as contacts, messages and so on.

steps.title: You can also sync your contacts to Nokia server and restore them back to any phone.
steps.content: You can also sync your contacts to Nokia server and restore them back to any phone. To do this select Nokia Sync from menu of Nokia phone.

steps.title: Select contents to be synced i.e.
steps.content: Select contents to be synced i.e. contacts, message, bookmarks etc.

steps.title: Select "sync internal".
steps.content: Select "sync internal". This could be either manual or automatic. You may need a Nokia email id for this to login.

steps.title: Select "Sync Now" after setting up all.
steps.content: Select "Sync Now" after setting up all. Your contacts will be uploaded to Nokia server as backup.

steps.title: To restore your contacts to new phone, login with nokia id and in sync menu select "Restore Data".
steps.content: To restore your contacts to new phone, login with nokia id and in sync menu select "Restore Data". Your contacts, messages, bookmarks etc will be restored in your new phone.
